meaning: To speak easily and continuously about something.

meaning: To wander around from place to place.
example: Sattanathan was given the name Seththirabalan because he was always gadding about to many temples.

meaning: A person who travels or wanders around a lot.
A group of people or animals that are noisy or chaotic.
example: A gaggle of students gathered around the entrance, chatting loudly before the school doors opened.
